data.text: @dottiechauncy @SenseOf_OUTRAGE Good question! I've been told by district admins, "Parents NEED daycare so they can work," in response to asking why they were ending safety measures. If public schools are just daycare centers, where do kids go to get a decent education? 🤔

@ndypez @bbrucker2 The data is from an unbiased source. People have been disenrolling in response to safety measures being removed and mandates being lifted. Perhaps in the previous year, which is shown on the graph, parents left in part due to mandates. The sharpest drops happened this year.
@Tamaramonkey @SenseOf_OUTRAGE 10 hours? Is this the charter school industry trying to wipe out daycare; basically all small businesses or private individuals?

@Tamaramonkey @bbrucker2 The graph showed is cropped to seem like a dramatic drop of almost 100%, I’m saying it is misleading… it’s ‘how to lie with statistics’ 101.  It’s a psychological trick.  And no, I’m not surprised at that drop at all, probably a backfire from mandates.
@Tamaramonkey Not to be too cynical but it's an election year. That's why protocols are being dropped.
@Tamaramonkey @MightyM55070329 Agree completely. We waste way too many kids the way things are now.

@Piping_In @Jackiebulthuis Sure! Good question! They'll receive funding based only on average enrollment, and stop being penalized when kids are absent or stay home sick, which should be a positive change for families, and may encourage schools to do more to attract enrollees. https://t.co/utYsq1y3Dv

@MightyM55070329 @Mary07598877 True. At the state and local level there's additional money at stake, and admins are happy to sacrifice safety of students and their families to keep that money. I actually want them to have more money, but for paying higher teacher salaries, not district fat cat bonuses.

@Mary07598877 @MightyM55070329 Hey, that's a great point. I'm fine with my taxes going toward DECENT education. It makes our country a safer, cleaner, more creative, and happy place to be WHEN it's inclusive, safe, and based on knowledge and reason. With corrupt admins in charge, it's absolute shite.
